plan.name: read-item-price
plan.description: Read the unit price of an [item][items]. The unit price of an item is the price for one unit (quantity = 1)

step.description: Follow a link from item to price.

plan.name: read-cart-line-item-price
plan.description: Read the unit price of a cart line item. The unit price of a cart line item is the price for one unit when a given quantity is purchased (the line item quantity).

step.description: Follow a link from line item to price.

plan.name: read-lowest-price-of-item-options
plan.description: Read the price of the item option with the lowest price. This link will only appear if the item has options.

step.description: Follow a link from itemdefinition to fromprice.

plan.name: read-shipment-line-item-price
plan.description: Retrieves the price of a shipment line item.

step.description: Follow a link from a shipment line item to a price.
